summary: A suite of unit tests that validate the boundingâ€‘box subsetting logic for various grid configurations and coordinate edge cases, ensuring correct handling of latitude/longitude naming, inverted axes, irregular and curvilinear grids, positive longitudes, time dimensions, and appropriate warnings or errors.
